dmca.title: ABUSE] travel-in-uk.com]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2005 11:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; editor@britainexpress.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] travel-in-uk.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] travel-in-uk.com
Date: Mon, 4 Jul 2005 14:36:46 +0100
From: Britain Express <editor@britainexpress.com>
Reply-To: Britain Express <editor@britainexpress.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Re: domain www.travel-in-uk.com

Hello,

I have emailed on two previous occasions to report that the above domain has
pirated my web site. I have also mailed a signed Copyright Infringement
notice to your legal contact person. I have not received any reply to my
emails or letter.

Google and Yahoo have dropped this domain after reviewing my complaints
about it.

Travel-in-uk has copied hundreds (if not thousands) of pages from my site at
www.britainexpress.com and replaced my logo and put a few of their banner
ads on the copied pages.

Your client is engaged in dishonest practice, and I'd like action taken.
I hate to be a pain, but this really is unacceptable. I will be resending
this email as often as it takes until some action is taken.

Regards,

David Ross

Publisher
Britain Express - The UK Travel and Heritage Guide
http://www.britainexpress.com

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCyrJEvK/XpJs6oyURAuJAAJoCyozBRWTNc9AKWxXE6K2WT7JSQwCfdZdS
CAAGgDdDgdstiAaXhC7mF5M=
=7Ecu
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
